title: Computing Thinking and Mathematics Integrated Education: Scratch-Geogebra Utilization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in limited technological environments presupposing smartphone-based learning, with case-centered education for social sector job integration

learning_goals: Students can design projects that solve mathematical problems based on computational thinking using Scratch and GeoGebra
Learners can concretize abstract mathematical concepts through the interaction of block-based programming and interactive math visualization tools
Participants develop strategies to manage cognitive load experienced during tool integration and enhance self-efficacy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
